settings.title: Settings
settings.explanationDesc: Learn about each setting option below
settings.onlyPlusesExplanation: When enabled, only addition problems will be generated. When disabled, both addition and subtraction problems are included.
settings.shuffleExplanation: Randomly mixes the digit positions within each number. Numbers with fewer digits than the maximum setting will also appear, with higher frequency for numbers closer to the maximum digit setting.
settings.speedExplanation: Controls how fast each number appears during the iteration flow. Slower speeds give more time to process each number. Speeds under 150ms may cause sound lag issues.
settings.digitExplanation: Sets the maximum number of digits for each number in the problems (e.g., 3 digits = numbers up to 999).
settings.questionsExplanation: Determines how many numbers will appear in each practice session.
settings.separatorExplanation: When enabled, displays thousands separators in numbers (e.g., 1234 becomes 1,234) for easier reading.
settings.notifyExplanation: When enabled, plays 2 beep sounds before starting each session to help you prepare and focus.

settingsMultiply.title: Settings (multiplication)
settingsMultiply.explanationDesc: Learn about each setting option below
settingsMultiply.isMultiplyExplanation: When enabled, division problems will be generated. When disabled, multiplication problems are generated.
settingsMultiply.speedExplanation: Controls how fast each number appears during the calculation iteration flow. Slower speeds give more time to process each number. Speeds under 150ms may cause sound lag issues.
settingsMultiply.bigDigitExplanation: Sets the maximum number of digits for the larger number in problems (e.g., 3 digits = numbers up to 999).
settingsMultiply.smallDigitExplanation: Sets the maximum number of digits for the smaller number in problems (e.g., 2 digits = numbers up to 99).
settingsMultiply.questionsExplanation: Determines how many problems will appear in each practice session.

customOptions.rangeWord: Enter a value between 100 and 30000. (1000 = 1 second)
customOptions.insertBigger: Small digit must be less than big digit.
customOptions.speedWarning: Speeds under 150ms may cause sound lag issues

problemList.checkProbDesc: Review all calculation problems and answers from your session.
problemList.burningModeEnabled: Burning mode enabled. Now it will continue infinitely without stop.
problemList.burningModeDisabled: Burning mode disabled. Now it will stop after the set number of questions.

themePicker.title: Change Theme Color
themePicker.description: Select your app's main theme color
